snippet: Reshma Begum, who survived for 17 days in the rubble of a collapsed garment factory, fielded many job offers before accepting work at the Westin Hotel in Dhaka.
abstract: Reshma Begum, who survived for 17 days before being rescued from rubble of collapsed garment factory in Bangladesh, fields many job offers before accepting work at Westin Hotel in Dhaka; vows to never again work in garment factory; 1,129 people were killed in April in deadliest disaster in history of garment industry.
lead_paragraph: Reshma Begum, who survived for 17 days in the rubble of a collapsed garment factory, fielded many job offers before accepting work at the Westin Hotel in Dhaka.

headline.seo: Bangladesh Factory Collapse Survivor Leaves Hospital
headline.main: Bangladesh Survivor Leaves Hospital With Job
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh Survivor Leaves Hospital With Job
